content: in ends block scarf if you didn t block the individual round 2 cc3 round 3 cc2 round 4 cc1 squares finishing block squares to finished measurements if necessary all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 11/11/24 © fairmount fibers ltd 2024 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 3 of 3
